===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[Chinese]] [[ink]] or [[ink]] in general
# [[black]]; [[ink]]-coloured; [[dark]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} to [[tattoo]] the [[face]]
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} to [[embezzle]]
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} someone's [[poetry]], [[essay]]s [[handwriting]] or [[painting]]
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[learning]]; [[knowledge]]
# {{zh-short|墨家|[[Mohism]]}}
# {{zh-short|墨西哥|[[Mexico]]}}
